thread.title: Chinese government orchestrated flag-waving UK welcome for Xi Jinping
thread.title_full: Chinese government orchestrated flag-waving UK welcome for Xi Jinping - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Chinese government orchestrated flag-waving UK welcome for Xi Jinping
text: The Chinese government was behind apparently spontaneous Chinese flag-waving in London to welcome president Xi Jinping on his state visit, evidence appears to show. Photographs produced by Amnesty UK appear to show Chinese government diplomatic cargo boxes full of flags, t-shirts and other merchandise destined for the countryâ€™s embassy in Britain. Diplomatic cargo can only be sent by government officials and by international law it can only contain items meant for official use. Read more
